capability.name: Business Development
capability.definition: Define, implement, track and assess the new business development plans
capability.role: Define, implement, track and assess the new business development plans for the enterprise or specific business divisions. This can cover business activities such as new market segment entry, product coverage and product specification development, brand development, new customer acquisition and existing customer, cross-sell/up-sell and retention.
capability.example: Corporate strategy develops targets for new business acquisition in selected market segments

key_features.name: Define governing policies and guidelines
key_features.description: Enables define governing policies and guidelines to support define, implement, track and assess the new business development plans

key_features.name: Define business goals
key_features.description: Enables define business goals to support define, implement, track and assess the new business development plans

key_features.name: Define supporting business development strategies
key_features.description: Enables define supporting business development strategies to support define, implement, track and assess the new business development plans

key_features.name: Track progress towards goals and direct activity
key_features.description: Enables track progress towards goals and direct activity to support define, implement, track and assess the new business development plans
